titles.title: A bill for the relief of Peter J. Montagnoli.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 3/17/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States for expenses incurred in securing reimbursement of disability insurance benefits under the Social Security Act for a specified period.
